data.oai_dc:dc: Observations from the K2C PartnershipSince 2006, the Kosciusko to Coast (K2C) Partnership has been committed to building the resilience, extent and connectedness of natural vegetation and halting the further decline and loss of species across the Kosciusko to Coast Region. K2C activities focus on private and public lands where landholders are interested in voluntary cooperative conservation incentives and protection options.|42 occurrences
